content:
I just mentioned this at #containers > 2024-04-15 ui-dev meeting but I highly recommend the talk by @Vera Clemens at the ui-dev meeting on Monday.

They wrote their own python code to transform a normal JSON into the complicated JSON required by Dataverse's native API.

They also run a Python service in between their React code and the Dataverse API.

Please see the other post for links to the recording or go to https://ui.gdcc.io
